problem.markdown:
>>The least weathered soil horizon, comprised of materials similar to the underlying parent material, is known as the ___ horizon. << () A () B (x) C () E () O
[explanation] The C horizon is comprised of materials similar to the parent material, and is the least weathered horizon. [explanation]
problem.p: The least weathered soil horizon, comprised of materials similar to the underlying parent material, is known as the ___ horizon.

choicegroup.label: The least weathered soil horizon, comprised of materials similar to the underlying parent material, is known as the ___ horizon.

div.p: The C horizon is comprised of materials similar to the parent material, and is the least weathered horizon.
